title: Protest march against Govt heading to Colombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The “People’s March Against The Government” resumed on Tuesday (19) morning and the protest march is making its way towards Colombo.
The purpose of this protest is to drive away from the Government and build a people-friendly Government.
This march started in Beruwala on Sunday (17) and today is the last day of this march.
